```{r}
loxcoder::load_origin_distmaps('/run/media/zsteve/ssd_ext/maps/origin')
loxcoder::load_pair_distmaps('/run/media/zsteve/ssd_ext/maps/pair')
samples_data <- lapply(samples_data, function(t){
  t <- loxcoder::validate(t)
  t <- loxcoder::makeid(t)
  t <- loxcoder::get_origin_dist(t)
  return(t)
})
```


```{r, fig.width=15, warning = F}
# analysis for 12k samples
samp_12k <- fnames_no_samp[grep('12k', fnames_no_samp)]

plots_correl <- lapply(samp_12k, function(x) lapply(samp_12k, function(y) loxcoder::pair_comparison_plot(samples_data[[y]], samples_data[[x]])))

grid.arrange(grobs = plots_correl[[1]][1:4], nrow = 2)
grid.arrange(grobs = plots_correl[[5]][5:8], nrow = 2)
grid.arrange(grobs = plots_correl[[9]][9:12], nrow = 2)
```
```{r, fig.width = 15}
# now look at size and distance

size_plots <- lapply(samp_12k, function(x) loxcoder::size_plot(samples_data[[x]]))
grid.arrange(grobs = size_plots)

# size 9 distances
dist_plot_9 <- lapply(samp_12k, function(x) loxcoder::dist_orig_plot(samples_data[[x]], 9))
grid.arrange(grobs = dist_plot_9)

# rank count plot
rank_count_plot <- lapply(samp_12k, function(x) loxcoder::rank_count_plot(samples_data[[x]], 9))
grid.arrange(grobs = rank_count_plot[5:8])
```

```{r}
sample_a <- samples_data['50k_1_2__A'][[1]]
sample_b <- samples_data['50k_3_2__A'][[1]]

loxcoder::pair_comparison_plot(sample_a, sample_b)

loxcoder::valid(sample_a) %>% filter(size == 9) %>% filter(dist_orig == 6) -> sample_a_codes
loxcoder::valid(sample_b) %>% filter(size == 9) %>% filter(dist_orig == 6) -> sample_b_codes

codes_all <- c(sample_a_codes$code, sample_b_codes$code)
codes_all_vec <- loxcoder::get_cass_vec(codes_all)
loxcoder::retrieve_dist_pair(codes_all_vec, 9) -> m

library(ComplexHeatmap)
Heatmap(m, cluster_rows = F, cluster_columns = F)
```

```{r}
sample_a2 <- samples_data['50k_2_2__B'][[1]]
sample_a1 <- samples_data['50k_2_2__A'][[1]]

colnames(n) <- sample_a_codes$dist_orig
Heatmap(n, column_names_gp = gpar(fontsize = 8), column_names_rot = 90)
```
